name: Next.js Middleware Bot Detection (概念)
description: User-Agent 判定でボット制御の概念

files.template:
import { NextResponse } from 'next/server';
export function middleware(req: Request){ const ua=(req as any).headers.get('user-agent')||''; if(/bot|crawler|spider/i.test(ua)) return new Response('bot', { status: 403 }); return NextResponse.next(); }
